spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout and room adjacencies are highly accurate. Most doors and windows match the 2D reference. Minor distortion in the proportions of the master bedroom (Bed-1) and the kitchen utility area. Door swings are inconsistent compared to the source blueprint.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent conversion with no hallucinated rooms. Background and floating model constraints are met. However, the 3D render includes a red arrow UI element from the floor plan which should have been removed.

furniture_mapping.notes: Dining table, beds, and kitchen islands are placed correctly. The living room seating arrangement (sofas) is simplified and lacks the exact count/orientation of the original blueprint chairs.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Adheres well to low-poly, flat-shaded constraints. Lighting is soft and non-dramatic. The camera is isometric, though slightly off-center relative to the model's footprint.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout distortion in the kitchen/utility wall alignment and master bedroom width.
Inclusion of the red entrance arrow from the source plan as a 3D artifact.
Missing specific accent chairs in the living room area compared to the detailed plan.
